articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: U.S. Bank will close its Drain branch on January 15, 2026. Officials say the move reflects a shift toward digital banking, with no disruption to customer accounts. The nearest branch will be in Cottage Grove. U.S. Bank also plans to close its Mill City branch days earlier on January 12.
articles.title: U.S. Bank to Close Drain Branch in January 2026

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: The Roseburg School Board has approved up to $95,000 to add private changing and shower areas to Roseburg High School’s locker rooms. The upgrades aim to improve student comfort and privacy, with plans for individual stalls and enclosed spaces funded through the district’s 404 infrastructure fund.
articles.title: Roseburg School Board Prioritizes Funding for Locker Room Privacy Upgrades

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: Goin’ Postal has opened a new Roseburg location at 2210 Stewart Parkway, now called Goin’ Postal Hobbies & More. The store combines shipping services with toys, collectibles, and games at bargain prices. A grand opening sale offers $139.99 mailboxes through the end of the month.
articles.title: Goin’ Postal Hobbies & More Opens New Roseburg Location

articles.description: A new Holiday Inn Express on Northwest Mulholland Drive in Roseburg is nearly complete. The 100-room hotel, featuring an indoor pool, is expected to open in January as part of the Hanna Heritage Place development, expanding Roseburg’s hospitality and retail offerings.
